shopping.notes_local: 下浩里区域的茶室，非常适合喜欢可爱物品的女朋友。品尝当地茶品，享受宁静时光。已包含在下午行程中。营业时间10:00-21:00。
shopping.location_base: Xiayao Li Old Street 128 (Shop 55), Chongqing
shopping.location_local: 重庆市下浩里老街128号55号商铺
shopping.notes_base: Tea house in Xiayao Li area, perfect for girlfriend who loves cute things. Enjoy local tea and peaceful atmosphere. Already included in afternoon itinerary. Open 10am-9pm.

shopping.notes_local: 历史老街，有本地商铺、咖啡馆和创意店。适合拍照和逛小精品店。下午行程的一部分。营业时间9:00-22:00。支持现金和移动支付。
shopping.location_base: Nanbin Road and Dongshuimen Bridge, Chongqing
shopping.location_local: 重庆市南滨路与东水门长江大桥交叉口
shopping.notes_base: Historic old street with local shops, cafes, and creative stores. Good for photography and browsing small boutiques. Part of afternoon itinerary. Open 9am-10pm. Cash and mobile payment accepted.

shopping.notes_local: 晚餐之后可选前往太古里购物中心。成都最时尚的购物综合体，露天设计，国际品牌和本地精品店。评分4.9。周一至周四营业10:00-22:00，周五至周日10:00-22:30。用户指定为可选活动。

search_results.display_text: 高德地图 - 成都太古里

shopping.location_base: No. 8 Zhongsha Hat Street, Daci Temple Area, Jinjiang District
shopping.location_local: 锦江区中纱帽街8号
shopping.notes_base: OPTIONAL evening visit to Taikoo Li after dinner per user request. Chengdu's trendiest shopping complex with open-air design, international brands and local boutiques. Rating 4.9/5. Open Mon-Thu 10:00-22:00, Fri-Sun 10:00-22:30. User-specified optional activity.

shopping.location_base: No. 8 Zhongsha Hat Street, Daci Temple Area, Jinjiang District
shopping.location_local: 锦江区中纱帽街8号
shopping.notes_base: Chengdu's trendiest shopping complex with open-air design, international brands and local boutiques. Quick 30-minute visit before lunch. Rating 4.9/5. Open Mon-Thu 10:00-22:00, Fri-Sun 10:00-22:30.
shopping.notes_local: 成都最时尚的购物综合体，露天设计，国际品牌和本地精品店。午餐前快速30分钟购物。评分4.9。营业时间：周一至周四10:00-22:00，周五至周日10:00-22:30。
由1970年代电影建筑改造的三层二手概念店。2楼：约13000本精选书籍（3-4折）。3楼：1500+件二手设计师服装（约2.5折）。1楼：艺术展览，有著名的405块猫砖墙。全中国唯一的多抓鱼实体店。营业时间10:00-22:00。店名源自法语'Déjà Vu'。
shopping.location_base: No. 300 Anfu Road, Xuhui District, Shanghai
shopping.location_local: 上海市徐汇区安福路300号
shopping.notes_base: Three-story secondhand concept store in converted 1970s film building. Floor 2: ~13,000 curated books (3-4x off original price). Floor 3: ~1,500+ secondhand designer clothing (~2.5x off). Floor 1: art exhibitions with famous 405-tile cat-brick wall. The ONLY remaining physical Duozhuayu store in all of China. Open 10:00-22:00. Name from French 'Déjà Vu'.

shopping.type_local: 韩国生活方式&设计品店
shopping.notes_local: 四层韩国生活方式品牌旗舰店，中国首店。多巴胺美学产品：文具、手机壳、毛绒玩具、宠物用品、厨具、睡衣、针织手提包。有巨型Wiggle Bear装置和打卡'侧翻房间'。价格区间¥46-554。营业时间10:00-22:00。评分4.7。
shopping.location_base: No. 322 Anfu Road, Building 2, Xuhui District, Shanghai
shopping.location_local: 上海市徐汇区安福路322号2幢
shopping.notes_base: Four-story Korean lifestyle brand flagship, their first store in China. Colorful 'dopamine aesthetic' products: stationery, phone cases, plush toys, pet accessories, kitchenware, pajamas, knit tote bags. Giant Wiggle Bear installations and Instagram-worthy 'sideways room'. Price range ¥46-554. Open 10:00-22:00. Rating 4.7/5.

shopping.notes_local: 高端多品牌设计师精品店，约70%中国独立设计师+30%国际小众品牌。由前恒生银行改造。著名的'Jellycat楼梯'打卡点。店名'& FLOW'谐音'安福'。品牌包括Calvin Luo、Sunnei、Nanushka。价格区间¥500-5000+。仅浏览（预算=0）。营业时间10:00-21:00。评分4.7。
shopping.location_base: No. 168 Anfu Road, Yiyuan, Xuhui District, Shanghai
shopping.location_local: 上海市徐汇区安福路168号亦园
shopping.notes_base: Premium multi-brand designer boutique curating ~70% Chinese independent designers + ~30% international niche labels. Converted from former Hang Seng Bank branch. Famous 'Jellycat staircase' photo spot. Name '& FLOW' is a pun on 'Anfu' (安福). Brands include Calvin Luo, Sunnei, Nanushka. Price range ¥500-5,000+. Window shopping / browsing only (budget = 0). Open 10:00-21:00. Rating 4.7/5.

shopping.notes_local: 两层吉伊卡哇旗舰店（约500+平米，1000+商品）。上海独家：复古旗袍毛绒、大闸蟹毛绒、舞狮毛绒。位置靠近SK逅熙酒店（距北京东路668号步行5分钟）。营业时间10:00-22:00，无需预约。评分4.8。验证地址：南京东路123号外滩中央商场F1层（外滩中央广场）。
shopping.location_base: No. 123 Nanjing East Road, Bund Central Plaza F1, Huangpu District, Shanghai
shopping.location_local: 上海市黄浦区南京东路123号外滩中央商场F1层
shopping.notes_base: Two-floor Chiikawa flagship store (~500+ sqm, 1000+ products). Shanghai-exclusive items: vintage cheongsam plush, hairy crab plush, lion dance plush. Located near SK Lusso Hotel (5 min walk from 北京东路668号). Open 10:00-22:00, no reservation needed. Rating 4.8/5. Verified address: 南京东路123号外滩中央商场F1层 (Bund Central Plaza).

shopping.notes_local: 韩国最大时尚平台Musinsa于2025年12月开设的中国首店。三层楼，约40个韩国品牌+6个中国设计师+国际品牌。位于安福路时尚购物区。仅浏览（预算=0）。注意：新开业店铺，高德地图暂无精确POI。访问前请通过小红书或大众点评核实。
shopping.location_base: No. 201 Anfu Road, Xuhui District, Shanghai
shopping.location_local: 上海市徐汇区安福路201号
shopping.notes_base: Korea's largest fashion platform Musinsa opened their first China offline store in December 2025. Three floors featuring ~40 Korean brands + 6 Chinese designers + international labels. Located on Anfu Road trendy shopping area. Window shopping / browsing only (budget = 0). Note: Store opened recently, exact POI not yet in Gaode Maps database. Verify via RedNote or Dianping before visiting.

shopping.notes_local: 中国设计师品牌'短句'，专营女性简约服装。位于安福路购物街。仅浏览（预算=0）。注意：高德地图未验证精确POI。访问前请通过小红书或大众点评核实店铺位置。
shopping.location_base: No. 290 Anfu Road, Xuhui District, Shanghai
shopping.location_local: 上海市徐汇区安福路290号
shopping.notes_base: Chinese designer brand 'Short Sentence' (短句) specializing in women's minimalist clothing. Located on Anfu Road shopping street. Window shopping / browsing only (budget = 0). Note: Exact POI not verified in Gaode Maps. Verify store location via RedNote or Dianping before visiting.

shopping.notes_local: 盲盒收藏品和设计师潮玩旗舰店。丰富的系列包括Molly、Dimoo、Labubu。适合收集可爱玩具。南京路有多家门店。
shopping.name_local: POP MART泡泡玛特(全球旗舰店)
shopping.location_base: No. 299 Nanjing East Road, Hongyi International Plaza F1, Huangpu District, Shanghai
shopping.location_local: 上海市黄浦区南京东路299号宏伊国际广场F1层
shopping.notes_base: Flagship store for blind box collectibles and designer toys. Wide selection of series including Molly, Dimoo, Labubu. Great for cute collectibles. Multiple locations on Nanjing Road.

shopping.notes_local: 泡泡玛特的替代选择。设计师玩具和收藏品。比泡泡玛特更实惠。多个系列和联名。通过微信查看确切位置。
shopping.location_base: No. 558 Nanjing East Road, Shanghai Tourism Goods Building, Huangpu District, Shanghai
shopping.location_local: 上海市黄浦区南京东路558号上海旅游品商厦
shopping.notes_base: Alternative to Popmart. Designer toys and collectibles. More affordable than Popmart. Multiple series and collaborations. Check WeChat for exact locations.

shopping.notes_local: 靠近南京路的高端商场。时尚品牌和小众精品店。比南京路主街人少。国际和本地品牌搭配好。营业时间10:00-22:00。
shopping.location_base: No. 288 Shimen Yi Road, Jing'an District, Shanghai
shopping.location_local: 上海市静安区石门一路288号
shopping.notes_base: Upscale mall near Nanjing Road. Fashion brands, niche boutiques. Less crowded than main Nanjing Road. Good mix of international and local brands. Open 10am-10pm.

shopping.notes_local: 较新的高端购物综合体。时尚零售和生活方式店铺。比南京路更现代。游客较少。地铁可达。营业至22:00。
shopping.location_base: No. 500 Dongyu Road, Pudong District, Shanghai
shopping.location_local: 上海市浦东新区东育路500弄1-9号
shopping.notes_base: Newer upscale shopping complex. Fashion retailers and lifestyle stores. More modern than Nanjing Road. Less touristy. Metro accessible. Open until 10pm.

shopping.notes_local: 小众生活方式精品店。时尚配饰、文具、家居用品。适合拍照打卡。年轻人喜欢。通过大众点评或微信确认位置。
shopping.location_base: No. 285 Anyuan Road, Jing'an District, Shanghai
shopping.location_local: 上海市静安区安远路285号
shopping.notes_base: Niche lifestyle boutique. Fashion accessories, stationery, home goods. Instagram-worthy. Popular with young locals. Verify location via Dianping or WeChat.

shopping.notes_local: 大学区购物。年轻时尚、平价服装。靠近清华/北大。女朋友下课后傍晚逛街好去处。营业到很晚。
shopping.location_base: No. 28 Chengfu Road, Haidian District, Beijing
shopping.location_local: 北京市海淀区成府路28号
shopping.notes_base: University area shopping. Youth fashion, affordable clothing. Close to Tsinghua/Peking University. Ideal for evening after girlfriend's class. Open late.

shopping.notes_local: 大学区购物。年轻时尚、平价服装。靠近清华/北大。女朋友下课后傍晚逛街好去处。营业到很晚。
shopping.location_base: No. 28 Chengfu Road, Haidian District, Beijing
shopping.location_local: 北京市海淀区成府路28号
shopping.notes_base: University area shopping. Youth fashion, affordable clothing. Close to Tsinghua/Peking University. Ideal for evening after girlfriend's class. Open late.

shopping.notes_local: 艺术画廊和精品店。独特时尚单品、配饰、设计师商品。创意氛围。适合拍照。通常营业时间10:00-18:00。
shopping.location_base: No. 4 Jiuxianqiao Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing
shopping.location_local: 北京市朝阳区酒仙桥路4号
shopping.notes_base: Art galleries with boutique shops. Unique fashion items, accessories, designer goods. Creative atmosphere. Great for photography. Open 10am-6pm typically.

shopping.notes_local: 三里屯时尚区旗舰店。与上海同样的盲盒收藏品。品类丰富。适合收集可爱玩具。营业时间10:00-22:00。
shopping.name_local: POP MART泡泡玛特(三里屯太古里南区店)
shopping.location_base: No. 19 Sanlitun Road, Taikoo Li South B1, Chaoyang District, Beijing
shopping.location_local: 北京市朝阳区三里屯路19号院三里屯太古里南区B1层SLG58
shopping.notes_base: Flagship store in trendy Sanlitun area. Same blind box collectibles as Shanghai. Wide selection. Good for cute collectibles. Open 10am-10pm.

shopping.notes_local: 北京最潮的购物区。时尚品牌和生活方式店铺。适合时尚购物。奢侈品和中端混搭。露天设计。营业至22:00。
shopping.location_base: No. 11 & 19 Sanlitun Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing
shopping.location_local: 北京市朝阳区三里屯路11、19号院
shopping.notes_base: Beijing's trendiest shopping area. Fashion brands, lifestyle stores. Great for fashion shopping. Mix of luxury and mid-range. Open-air design. Open until 10pm.

shopping.notes_local: 高端生活方式商场。时尚、配饰、特色商店。比三里屯人少。氛围好。靠近朝阳公园。营业时间10:00-22:00。
shopping.location_base: No. 6 Chaoyang Park Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing
shopping.location_local: 北京市朝阳区朝阳公园路6号
shopping.notes_base: Upscale lifestyle mall. Fashion, accessories, specialty stores. Less crowded than Sanlitun. Good atmosphere. Near Chaoyang Park. Open 10am-10pm.

shopping.notes_local: 历史胡同里的小精品店和手工艺品店。独特时尚单品和配饰。价格实惠。地道本地购物。避开主要游客巷道，探索旁边小巷。
shopping.location_base: Nanluoguxiang, Jiaodaokou Street, Dongcheng District, Beijing
shopping.location_local: 北京市东城区交道口街道南锣鼓巷
shopping.notes_base: Small boutiques and craft shops in historic hutongs. Unique fashion items, accessories. Affordable. Authentic local shopping. Avoid main tourist alley, explore side streets.

shopping.notes_local: 女朋友下课后傍晚购物。本地商店、年轻时尚。平价服装和配饰。适合舒适区探索。
shopping.location_base: No. 28 Chengfu Road, Haidian District, Beijing
shopping.location_local: 北京市海淀区成府路28号
shopping.notes_base: Evening shopping after girlfriend's class. Local shops, youth fashion. Affordable clothing and accessories. Good for comfort zone exploration.

shopping.notes_local: 女朋友下课后傍晚购物。本地商店、年轻时尚。平价服装和配饰。适合舒适区探索。
shopping.location_base: No. 28 Chengfu Road, Haidian District, Beijing
shopping.location_local: 北京市海淀区成府路28号
shopping.notes_base: Evening shopping after girlfriend's class. Local shops, youth fashion. Affordable clothing and accessories. Good for comfort zone exploration.

shopping.notes_local: 女朋友下课后傍晚购物。本地商店、年轻时尚。平价服装和配饰。适合舒适区探索。
shopping.location_base: No. 28 Chengfu Road, Haidian District, Beijing
shopping.location_local: 北京市海淀区成府路28号
shopping.notes_base: Evening shopping after girlfriend's class. Local shops, youth fashion. Affordable clothing and accessories. Good for comfort zone exploration.

shopping.notes_local: 最后一天的高端奢侈品购物。国际设计师品牌。尊贵购物体验。适合购买纪念性物品。营业时间10:00-22:00。
shopping.location_base: No. 87 Jianguo Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing
shopping.location_local: 北京市朝阳区建国路87号
shopping.notes_base: High-end luxury shopping for final day. International designer brands. Premium shopping experience. Good for memorable purchases. Open 10am-10pm.

shopping.notes_local: 法国百货商场，主营时尚和配饰。适合最后购物。商品优质。比SKP人少。营业时间10:00-22:00。
shopping.location_base: No. 110 Xidan North Street, Xicheng District, Beijing
shopping.location_local: 北京市西城区西单北大街110号
shopping.notes_base: French department store with fashion and accessories. Good for final shopping. Quality items. Less crowded than SKP. Open 10am-10pm.

shopping.notes_local: 购买中国茶叶作为礼物/纪念品。正宗本地产品。适合作为纪念。要求适合飞机携带的包装。品质因店而异。
shopping.name_local: 张一元茶庄(前门大街店)
shopping.location_base: No. 86 Qianmen Street, Dongcheng District, Beijing
shopping.location_local: 北京市东城区前门大街86号
shopping.notes_base: Purchase Chinese tea as gifts/souvenirs. Authentic local products. Good for memorable items. Ask for packaging suitable for air travel. Quality varies by shop.
